name: Zoopico
description:
Zoopico is a Zoop-like puzzle game for PICO-8.

How to play:
  • Use the arrow keys and X to control the pointy thing in the centre.
  • Clear shapes from the board to score points. If any shape reaches the centre square, the game ends.
  • Hit shapes of the same colour to clear them. Hit a shape of a different colour to swap colours.

 

  • Use power-ups to clear groups of shapes. The wheel clears a whole file. The lightning clears a 3x3 square. The paint blob clears all shapes of the target colour on that side of the screen.
  • Collect 5 springs to clear all shapes from the board.
  • Try to survive and get a high score!
